title: New: The Yukon Club – Absence
body:
Amsterdam quartet **The Yukon Club** seem to have existed for a couple of years now, yet this single, _Absence_, appears to mark a reinvention of some sort or another.

Atmospheric, electronic pop a la London Grammar, SOHN and Aussie outfit Tora, it’s intricately considered and certainly an impressive (returning) first step. Check it out below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
